description: This Java source file defines the EventProcessor class, which is responsible for processing event definitions within a given ICService model, creating EventWrapper objects, analyzing dependencies, and assisting in code generation for event-related features.

classes.name: EventProcessor
classes.description: A helper class to process and manage event definitions, generate wrappers, analyze dependencies, and assist in code generation related to events.

classes.name: CodeDefinition
classes.description: A simple data container for a code's name, value, and description used in event processing.

methods.name: buildModel
methods.description: Constructs an EventProcessor instance from an ICService object, creating EventWrapper objects for each event and setting their language scope and event codes.

methods.name: analyze
methods.description: Analyzes the processed events and associated variables to determine dependencies and usage of POJO, Enum, and Event variables.

methods.name: getWrappers
methods.description: Returns an iterator over all EventWrapper objects managed by this EventProcessor.

methods.name: getEventForName
methods.description: Retrieves the EventWrapper associated with a given variable name.

methods.name: getDefineCodes
methods.description: Returns a list of code definitions specified as defines in the XML model.

methods.name: getEventCodes
methods.description: Returns a list of event code definitions specified in the XML model.
